casebody.data:
Second Department,

September, 1951.

(September 18, 1951.) Maurice Block, Appellant, v. Julius Kahn, Respondent.

Appeal by-plaintiff from an order granting defendant’s motion for a severance of two causes of action set out in the amended complaint and directing a separate trial thereof. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements. No opinion. Carswell, Acting P. J., Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MacCrate, JJ., concur.
